pydexpi.dexpi_classes.instrumentation.actuatingElectricalFunction module

This module contains a pydantic class for the DEXPI ActuatingElectricalFunction class

class pydexpi.dexpi_classes.instrumentation.actuatingElectricalFunction.ActuatingElectricalFunction(*, id: str = None, plantTrain: PlantTrain | None = None, plantSystem: PlantSystem | None = None, plantArea: PlantArea | None = None, parentStructure: TechnicalItemParentStructure | None = None, customAttributes: list[CustomAttribute] = [], actuatingElectricalFunctionNumber: str | None = None, actuatingElectricalLocation: ActuatingElectricalLocation | None = None, systems: ActuatingElectricalSystem | None = None)

Bases: CustomAttributeOwner, SignalConveyingFunctionTarget, TechnicalItem

An actuation setting electrical function. It covers all types of electrical consumers, e.g., motors and heaters.
